With living snakes for hair, sthenos, who are descended from [medusas](/Monsters.aspx?ID=297), are a curious and independent ancestry. A newly emergent people, sthenos have existed for just barely over a century. Only a few generations have passed since their genesis, and some adult sthenos remember members of the original generation. Indeed, since sthenos can live about as long as [humans](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=6), a few of the original sthenos might yet live somewhere. As a people without a traditional homeland, sthenos seek to find societies that welcome them, which can be a challenging endeavor. With more than a passing resemblance to medusas, given their ophidian hair and striking features, they find most places are wary if not outright hostile to their presence. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 20 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15 [Stheno Harpist](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1327) **Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 258 **Perception** +4 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1); speak with snakes **Skills** [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +4, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +7, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +7, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +5 **Str** +0 **Dex** +2 **Con** +3 **Int** +1 **Wis** -1 **Cha** +4 **Snake Search** When the stheno harpist [Searches](/Actions.aspx?ID=519) or [Seeks](/Actions.aspx?ID=84), their snakes try to help too, rolling a separate Perception check with a modifier of –1 instead of +4. If the snakes notice something, they try to notify the stheno, though they are no more intelligent than normal snakes and might find different things interesting than the stheno does.
**Speak With Snakes** The stheno harpist can communicate with snakes, including the ones in their hair, and can use [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) to [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50) on snakes and [Request](/Actions.aspx?ID=51) things from snakes. **Items** [harp](/Equipment.aspx?ID=37), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Rapier](/Weapons.aspx?ID=36), [Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=77) --- **AC** 16 **Fort** +8 **Ref** +7 **Will** +4 **HP** 19 --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** rapier +7 ([deadly d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)), **Damage** 1d6 piercing **Melee** snake fangs +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)), **Damage** 1d4 piercing **Ranged** shortbow +7 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)), **Damage** 1d6 piercing **Occult Spontaneous Spells** DC 17 - **Cantrips (1st)** [Dancing Lights](/Spells.aspx?ID=58), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Ghost Sound](/Spells.aspx?ID=132), [Inspire Courage](/Spells.aspx?ID=386), [Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280) - **1st** [Phantom Pain](/Spells.aspx?ID=220), [Soothe](/Spells.aspx?ID=291)
name: Stheno Harpist
